reviewtext: Great CB for light use.  I love that it doesn't have a whole box to mount.  Makes it possible to install discretely without tearing up your dash.  And I love having the weather band.My only gripe is that there is not a black cap to put over the silver portable antenna outlet for a cleaner look when it's mounted in a vehicle.  I have tried to find something to put over it and I keep striking out.  Maybe somebody can suggest something?
